Header.titleOld: Playing with Metaphors is my cup of tea

About.aboutP1: I've got quite the mustache going on here (bet you pictured that random imaginary man, huh?). I don't usually like to brag about myself, but, got to do a little bragging to get your attention. Otherwise, you might just scroll on by. So, while I won't claim to have conquered the world, I've tried in making boring stuff interesting. Take, for instance, my copywriting for a simple doorbell. Trust me; it's worth a peek.
About.aboutP2: Oh, and you'll get a chuckle from my social media antics. I've cooked up some LOL-worthy awareness campaigns about overspeeding. I figure if it makes you laugh, you're more likely to remember it, right? And then, I gave the old-school Burger King campaign 'FLAME GRILLING SINCE 1954' a fresh twist.
About.aboutP3: Best thing about me : The best thing about me is that I write copy, like I'm writing to my best friend or giving advise to him/her. Because let's be real, the more relatable the copy, the better chance it has to stick in your brain. It's like trying to forget you stupid BFF - impossible.
About.aboutP4: But enough about yours truly; let's chat about what matters - you and me, quality time together. And if you want to see more of my creative exploits, just hit up the porfolio link in my resume.
